instructions: Min S September 27, 2013 at 3:48 pm Just open the WhatsApp application on your phone and tap "Contacts" then tap the "+" sign. Bear in mind that WhatsApp uses exclusively mobile numbers in order to find users. This means that if you add a contact to WhatsApp without a mobile number, you will not be able to contact this person via WhatsApp. This makes adding contacts without mobile numbers in WhatsApp useless.
